definition: Arishang Nahiyisi or Wenquan county in Börtala Mongol autonomous prefecture 博爾塔拉蒙古自治州|博尔塔拉蒙古自治州, Xinjiang
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
Arishang Nahiyisi or Wenquan county in Börtala Mongol autonomous prefecture 博爾塔拉蒙古自治州|博尔塔拉蒙古自治州, Xinjiang
to soak in a spa or hot spring

sentences.english: This splendid region of mountains and valleys contains many wonderful hot springs.
sentences.chinese: 这个风景英俊山区和上庄储藏着很多温泉。

sentences.english: This area is most suitable for growing wheat.
sentences.chinese: 现在去那两个温泉公园玩是最适宜了。

sentences.english: You can't take a towel into the hot spring.
sentences.chinese: 不可以把毛巾带到温泉里。

sentences.english: Soft spring water washes her greasily smooth skin.
At Lava Hot Springs in Idaho, visitors may bathe in the thermal mineral waters.
sentences.chinese: 当热熔岩在爱德荷州爆发，参观者可以去那里泡温泉。

sentences.english: Thermal spring tourism has become a hot topic in the field of tourism research in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，温泉旅游成为旅游研究的热点问题之一。

sentences.english: Also it is very helpful for lady's facial and spa treatment.
sentences.chinese: 同时它是非常有用的治疗夫人的面部和温泉浴场。

sentences.english: Wunquan town of Kaixian county has a long history of well salt production.
sentences.chinese: 开县温泉镇井盐生产历史悠久，源远流长。

sentences.english: Happiness would rise from the bottom of your heart when you're enjoying the hot springs.
sentences.chinese: 泡在阿尔山的温泉里，幸福则会从心底向外发散。

sentences.english: Every summer the Browns bath themselves in a hot spring.
sentences.chinese: 每年夏天布朗一家都去洗温泉。

sentences.english: It is like having your own spa in the comforts of your home.
sentences.chinese: 它就像拥有自己的温泉，在舒适的家里。

sentences.english: You can't use a washcloth in the bath.
sentences.chinese: 泡温泉时不可以用毛巾洗澡。

sentences.english: Spa-Like Bathrooms W/Quartz Counters & Double Sinks.
sentences.chinese: 温泉般的浴室与石英计数器和双水槽。

sentences.english: The expensive sun is all the hot springs of China, the world go to summer resort it all.
sentences.chinese: 贵阳是中国的温泉之都，世界的避暑之都。

sentences.english: This research was to study the perceived value and customer value of the mature-aged Hot-Spring.
sentences.chinese: 探讨熟龄族群消费者在温泉区之知觉价值。

sentences.english: Fiberglass spas have a great many advantages for the health conscious homeowner.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃钢温泉在保健方面具有巨大优势。

definition: to soak in a spa or hot spring
mouth of a spring or fountain
